nodes.bodyText: Again, this should be handled by the framework.

This should be handled by the framework - it'll automatically apply the default stylesheet, and additionally apply a stylesheet specified by JavaFxTopComponent.createStyle. These styles will cascade down from the top component to its children (at least that's how it's supposed to work.
It seems to be working fine after putting on the correct style sheet either way. Next commit will have the fixes in it 👍
